GHI Engineering - 16301 // trilogy-taro[bot] commented: > #taro-issue-summary

The customer experiences an unresponsive GFI LanGuard console screen and error messages when attempting to download December patches, despite successful Microsoft cloud connectivity. Customer Support should inform the customer that this was a test-generated incident and normal patch download functionality should be available.

Kayako - ticket id 60269018 // Andriy Rybalchenko commented publicly: 	* We are unable to download the December patches from the GFI console. We have verified that all network connectivity is functioning correctly from a network perspective. However, when we initiate the patch download, the screen becomes unresponsive after some time, and the error shown below appears.

We are able to connect properly to the Microsoft cloud, but the download does not complete. Kindly assist us in resolving this issue on a priority basis.
	* please raise the ticket and share with us.
